```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rio)
library(haven)
library(janitor)

all_risk_set <- read.csv("datasets/all_risk_set.csv") %>% 
  clean_names()
state_data <- read_dta("datasets/risk_states1.csv")

risk_state <- all_risk_set %>% 
  left_join(state_data)
```

```{r}
export(risk_state, "risk_states.csv")
```
